revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR840N |revision=v6 (ES/EU) |series=N300 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |fcc_date=10/11/2018 |fcc_id=TE7EN020F5 |pcb_id=2050501000 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628N;MEDIATEK, MT7628NN, 1804-AJCSL, EAP1B904; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q32CSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40GTP <!-- Zentel, A3S56D40GTP -50L, 805ZENT9 --> |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628N;MEDIATEK, MT7628NN, 1804-AJCSL, EAP1B904; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;4.3.0.0;Ralink; |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WR840N.html Product page] {{•}} [http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/TL-WR840N.html Support page] {{•}} [https://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/Emulator_TL-WR840NV6_EU/index.htm Demo UI]
*"2050501000" and "1809" is silkscreened on the board (v6.0). *"2050501175" and "1830" is silkscreened on the board (v6.2). {{See also|TP-LINK TL-WR850N v1|TP-LINK}}
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/support-for-tl-wr840n-ver-6-0/17041 ''Support for TL-WR840N Ver 6.0'' on '''OpenWrt/LEDE''' forums]
